resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/75274</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>75274</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40aee8f9-d150-4164-272d-917587fddd09#1#4</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Hiernonymus Bosch: A Hét főbűn, 1480 körül, Madrid, Prado, 120x150 cm, olaj, fa.</string>
            <string language="en">Hiernonymus Bosch: The Seven Deadly sins, About 1480, Madrid, Prado, 120x150 cm, oil, wood.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hiernonymus Bosch: Die sieben tödlichen 
Sünden, ungefähr 1480, Madrid, Prado, 120x150 Zentimeter, Öl, Holz.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Hiernonymus Bosch : Les sept péchés 
mortels, environ 1480, Madrid, Prado, 120x150 centimètre, huile, 
bois.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Hiernonymus Bosch: Os sete sins mortais, 
aproximadamente 1480, Madrid, Prado, 120x150 cm, óleo, madeira.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Hiernonymus Bosch: I sette sins mortali, 
circa 1480, Madrid, Prado, 120x150 centimetro, olio, legno.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Hiernonymus Bosch: Οι επτά θανάσιμες 
αμαρτίες, περίπου 1480, Μαδρίτη, Prado, 120x150 εκατ., 
πετρέλαιο, ξύλο.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hiernonymus Bosch: Los siete pecados 
mortales, cerca de 1480, Madrid, Prado, 120x150 centímetro, aceite, 
madera.</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A négyzetes táblán fekete alapon egy középső nagyobb körben a bűnök, és a sarkokban négy kisebb tondó</string>
            <string language="en">On the quadratic board in a central bigger circle on a black base there are the sins and 4 smaller tondos are in the corners</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Hieronymus Bosch,  15.század,  késő gótika,  halálos bűn,  főbűnök, </string>
            <string language="en">Hieronymus Bosch,  15th Century,  late Gothic art,  deadly sin,  mortal sin,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Auf dem quadratischen Brett in einem zentralen grösseren 
Kreis auf einer schwarzen Unterseite gibt es die Sünden und 4 
kleinere tondos sind in den Ecken</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sur le panneau quadratique en plus grand cercle central 
sur une base noire il y a les péchés et 4 plus petits tondos sont 
dans les coins</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Na placa quadrática em um círculo mais grande central em
uma base preta há os sins e 4 tondos menores estão nos cantos</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sul bordo quadratico in un cerchio più grande 
centrale su una base nera ci sono i sins e 4 più piccoli tondos sono 
nei angoli</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στο δευτέρου βαθμού πίνακα σε έναν κεντρικό 
μεγαλύτερο κύκλο σε μια μαύρη βάση υπάρχουν οι αμαρτίες και 4 
μικρότερα tondos είναι στις γωνίες</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En la tarjeta cuadrática en un círculo más grande 
central en una base negra hay los pecados y 4 tondos más pequeños 
están en las esquinas</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hieronymus Bosch, 15. Jahrhundert, späte gotische 
kunst, tödliche Sünde, Todsünde,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Hieronymus Bosch, 15ème siècle, art gothique en 
retard, péché mortel, péché mortel,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Hieronymus Bosch, 1ö século, arte gothic atrasada, 
sin mortal, sin mortal,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Hieronymus Bosch, quindicesimo secolo, arte gotica 
ritardata, sin mortale, sin mortale,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Hieronymus Bosch, 15$ος αιώνας, πρόσφατη γοτθική 
τέχνη, θανάσιμη αμαρτία, θανάσιμη αμαρτία,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hieronymus Bosch, décimo quinto siglo, último arte 
gótico, pecado mortal, pecado mortal,</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn:
org:IBCnet Magyarország Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
